definition: green area (e.g. urban park or garden)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Landscape irrigation is an important aspect of reclaimed wastewater reuse.
sentences.chinese: 灌溉绿地是再生水回用的重要途径之一。

sentences.english: Annotating the conception of green area ecological space of waterfront.
sentences.chinese: 诠释了滨水区绿地生态空间的概念。

sentences.english: To develop urban green planning system to strengthen urban greening segregating construction.
sentences.chinese: 要制定城市绿地系统规划，加强城市绿化隔离带建设。

sentences.english: They used an environmental database on land use to gauge the percentage of green space in the patients' neighborhoods.
sentences.chinese: 他们操作环境数据来测算病人四周的绿地面积。

sentences.english: A good urban green space system is necessary for ecological city construction.
sentences.chinese: 城市绿地系统是城市总体布局中的一个主要组成部分。

sentences.english: Carry on the elaboration Unifying the green space system plan of the Suzhou industry garden area.
sentences.chinese: 并结合苏州工业园区的绿地系统规划进行分析。

sentences.english: Set me whereas the sun doth parch the green.
sentences.chinese: 无论将我放在烈日烘烤绿地之处。

sentences.english: Urban green space system is the ecological basis for sustainable urban development.
sentences.chinese: 城市绿地系统是城市可持续发展的生态基础。

sentences.english: Airborne, the new dance photography of Lois Greenfield.
sentences.chinese: 空降，新舞蹈摄影的洛伊丝绿地。

sentences.english: We arrived there at 2:00 p. m. after the 2-hour-subway journey.
sentences.chinese: 经过2个小时左右的车程，我们抵达绿地万怡酒店。

sentences.english: Where are the green fields, that we used to roam?
sentences.chinese: 我们，曾是徜徉在那绿地上情侣。

sentences.english: These events will be held at the Greenbelt Public Observatory.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动将在公共绿地天文台。

sentences.english: This huge park offers green spaces, nature reserves and ample opportunity for sports.
sentences.chinese: 这个巨大的公园有绿地，自然保护区和体育场地。

sentences.english: Or they just might be the parks of London.
sentences.chinese: 或者，只是伦敦的公共绿地。

sentences.english: Green spaces is the heart of our city.

definition: to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
Longhu district of Shantou city 汕头市, Guangdong
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Vanke, large Chinese real estate company, founded in 1984
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
